name: Skeleton+
description:
This is an improved version of Skeleton with the following new features:
  • A life and a kill counter on screen
  • A new Undead Locator to help track skeletons
  • A selectable option to only have five skeletons per maze instead of ten
  • A selectable option to start with only forty-nine health instead of ninety-nine and your shots only do half the damage.
  • An option to turn the Undead Locator on or off during game play
  • An option to choose to have the skeleton speed reset only at the start of a level
  • An option to return the skeleton's touch to instant death like in the original version.

shot.caption: The yellow dot tells me which way the skeleton is.
